entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:32 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clearing. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 26 February 2023
